## ContractEvents.removeListener() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeListener(eventName: keyof TContract["filters"], listener: Listener): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | keyof TContract\["filters"\] | the event name as defined in the contract |
|  listener | Listener | the listener to unregister |
